lyrics:
15 contributorsluno lyricsverse 1 kele okereke
and youre tired of your mum and youre tired of your dad
got you jumping through hoops got you shaving your legs
let it pass let it pass let it pass over you
and youre tired of your face and youre tired of your nose
got you jumping through hoops got you shaving your legs
let it pass let it pass let it pass through you

chorus kele okereke
and your nose is bleeding
and your nose is bleeding
youve been lying to me
and your nose is bleeding
and your nose is bleeding
youve been lying to me

verse 2 kele okereke
there will be no hesitation there will be no confrontation
there will be no indication there will be no cause
there will be no exultation there will be no justification
there will be no way at all

chorus kele okereke
and your nose is bleeding
and your nose is bleeding
youve been lying to me
and your nose is bleeding
and your nose is bleeding
youve been lying to me
see bloc party liveget tickets as low as 86you might also likebridge kele okereke  gordon moakes
luno
luno
luno
luno come back to me the way you were
luno the way you were when we were young
luno im trying to tell you everything
luno im trying to tell you everything

verse 3 kele okereke
i can heal the blind i can cure the sick
i can heal the blind i can cure the sick
i can say the right things i can say the right things
whered you get so cruel whered you get so cruel
whered you get so cruel whered you get so cruel
where do you go cause youre never here

chorus kele okereke  gordon moakes
and your nose is bleeding you deserve it
and your nose is bleeding you deserve it
youve been lying to me

and your nose is bleeding you deserve it
youve been lying to me

luno
